scenes.background: (Bob) rubs his temples while (Monica) looks up from her screen, visibly frustrated.
scenes.description: 'It feels like we’re always scrambling. Maybe we should have a serious talk about our team’s efficiency.'

options.text: We could analyze our workflow and identify the bottlenecks. That might help.
options.analysis: You suggested a practical approach to solve the issue, showing good perception and social skills, though your self-regulation could be stronger.

options.text: I agree, but I think we need more than just a talk. We might need more manpower.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the problem but expressed skepticism about just having a talk, showing strong self-regulation but lower empathy and motivation.

options.text: If everyone was more proactive, we wouldn’t be in this mess all the time.
options.analysis: Your response was somewhat passive-aggressive, indicating lower empathy and self-regulation, and it might strain relationships with colleagues.
